alert.note: Alert for Logan; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 2:26PM MDT until August 07 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Weld County in northeastern Colorado... West central Logan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 315 PM MDT. * At 225 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of New Raymer, or 30 miles north of Fort Morgan, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Stoneham, New Raymer and Pawnee Pass. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
